sentences.en: Any student who tries to cheat while the examiner is watching is playing with fire.
sentences.cn: 在主考监考时任何学生想作弊都是冒险.

sentences.en: Don’t look at my cards - that’s cheating .
He had cheated in the test by using a calculator.
sentences.cn: 他在考试时作弊，用了计算器。

sentences.en: He raised his right fist and declaimed: "Liar and cheat!"
sentences.cn: 他举起右拳高喊：“骗子，骗子！”

sentences.en: He was publicly exposed as a liar and a cheat.
sentences.cn: 他的说谎者和骗子的面目被公诸于众.

sentences.en: I always cheat at cards; it's the only way I can win.
sentences.cn: 我玩纸牌时总作弊, 这是我能赢的唯一办法.

sentences.en: I assume that he won't cheat you.
I have found you out at last, you cheat!
sentences.cn: 我总算把你看透了, 你这个骗子!

sentences.en: It's really a cheat, but you can use ready-made pastry if you want.
sentences.cn: 这东西真是骗人，但如果你愿意的话，可以用现成的油酥面团。

sentences.en: She is accused of attempting to cheat the taxman.
sentences.cn: 她被指控企图蒙骗税务员。

sentences.en: She laid about him, calling him a liar and a cheat.
sentences.cn: 她攻击他, 说他说谎、是个骗子.

sentences.en: Space the desk a meter apart so that the pupils can't cheat.
sentences.cn: 把桌子按一米的间隔摆开以防学生作弊.

sentences.en: That man is a fraud [ cheat ].
The company engaged in a deliberate effort to cheat them out of their pensions.
sentences.cn: 公司涉嫌蓄意骗取他们的养老金。

sentences.en: The sheets I've bought are a cheat.
Watch that he doesn't cheat you.
We shall unmask that cowardly cheat.
sentences.cn: 我们要拆穿那个卑劣骗子的假面具.

trans.tran_cn: 作弊者，欺骗手段，作弊软件
trans.tran_en: someone who is dishonest and cheats
to behave in a dishonest way in order to win or to get an advantage, especially in a competition, game, or examination
to behave in a dishonest way in order to win or to get an advantage, especially in a competition, game, or examination
to behave in a dishonest way in order to win or to get an advantage, especially in a competition, game, or examination
